details.title: Summer Music Festival
details.description: Join us for three days of music, food, and fun in the sun! This year's lineup includes top artists from all genres, so there's something for everyone. Don't miss out on the biggest music event of the summer!

details.title: Art Show
details.description: Come see the latest works of some of the most talented artists in the region. There will be paintings, sculptures, and more on display. Admission is free, so bring your friends and family!

details.title: Charity Walk
details.description: Support a great cause and get some exercise at the same time! This charity walk raises money for cancer research and treatment. There are options for all skill levels, from a 1-mile walk to a 10k run. Register today!

details.title: International Film Festival
details.description: Experience the world through cinema at this year's International Film Festival. With films from over 50 countries, you'll be transported to places you never thought possible. Don't miss the chance to see some of the best films from around the globe.

details.title: Science Fiction Convention
details.description: Join fellow sci-fi fans for a weekend of panels, workshops, and events celebrating all things science fiction. Meet your favorite authors and actors, shop for unique merchandise, and attend exclusive screenings of the latest sci-fi films and shows.

details.title: Holiday Market
details.description: Get into the holiday spirit at this festive market featuring local artisans and vendors. Browse handmade gifts, sample seasonal treats, and enjoy live music and entertainment. Admission is free, so bring the whole family!

details.title: Winter Solstice Festival
details.description: Celebrate the longest night of the year at the Winter Solstice Festival. Enjoy live music, fire performances, and seasonal treats as we welcome the return of the sun. Dress warmly and bring your friends!

details.title: New Year's Eve Bash
details.description: Ring in the new year in style at the New Year's Eve Bash. Enjoy live music, gourmet food and drink, and a champagne toast at midnight. Dress to impress and dance the night away with friends and loved ones.
